body.para: I wrote a function for POE::Kernel called 'kill_session', oddly enough, it forces the removal of a session that you specify. All children of the session move up and become children of the grandparent, and all of the dispatching is taken care of for this.
The problem is, I have no clue how to subclass POE::Kernel, my attempt is located at http://kuiki.net/hachi/Kernel-killable.pm.txt
I also wrote a test case for the function, located at http://kuiki.net/hachi/kill-test.perl
If someone wants to help me out with subclassing this sucker properly, thanks. Otherwise you can just shove the function into Kernel.pm and it will work.
PS. I found that I wanted this functionality for use in POE::Component::Server::IRC, so thats why it has been written.
